tool_description: Detects and classifies traffic incidents such as accidents, construction, road closures, and weather-related disruptions from traffic data streams.
error_messages: Insufficient data: Need at least 5 traffic data points for reliable incident detection.
Invalid threshold: Detection threshold must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Data stream error: Traffic stream contains invalid or corrupted data.
Processing timeout: Incident detection took too long, try reducing data size.
usage: Provide traffic_stream array with real-time traffic data. Adjust detection_threshold to control sensitivity - higher values reduce false positives but may miss minor incidents.

incident_types.description: Classification of each incident: accident, construction, closure, weather

severity_levels.description: Severity of each incident: minor, moderate, major, critical

affected_segments.description: Road segments impacted by each incident
